Blue-chip LPing means providing liquidity on decentralized exchanges (DEXs) like Uniswap, Curve, or Balancer using trusted, established tokens (“blue chips”) — usually ETH, BTC, or stablecoins (USDC, DAI, USDT). It’s a lower-risk version of liquidity provision compared to farming

You can earn DeFi yield without touching shady farms.

1/ Liquid staking (Lido, RocketPool)
2/ Lending (Aave, Compound)
3/ Restaking (EigenLayer)
4/ Blue-chip LPing (Uniswap stable pairs)
5/ Yield aggregators (Yearn)

Which method is your favorite?
